name: Typescript-with-React
description: - Brenden Eich creates LiveScript for Netscape 1995 - Microsoft adopts it as JS-Script later renamed to JavaScript - Browser wars begin - each browser developer wants their version of JavaScript - Fragmentation of JavaScript as a result - VS8 (Chrome) Chakra(Microsoft) SpiderMonkey(Safari) - ECMA takes over standardisation of JavaScript  - ES6 (2015-2016) some major changes - introduces classes and the lamda arrow function - 2016-2020 continuous updates small incremental changes each year
